snippet: Under pressure from his opponent, Eliot Spitzer, a Democratic candidate for comptroller, released a portion of his federal tax return for the past two years.
abstract: Trailside blog; Eliot Spitzer, a Democratic candidate for comptroller, releases a portion of his federal tax return for the past two years; releases comes in response to pressure from opponent Scott M Stringer.
lead_paragraph: Under pressure from his opponent, Eliot Spitzer, a Democratic candidate for comptroller, released a portion of his federal tax return for the past two years.
